me.utk.util.misc

Class ThreadUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.utk.util.misc.ThreadUtil

  • public abstract class ThreadUtil
extends Object
    An abstract utility class for thread-centric utility functions.

    This class provides these methods:

    • The sleep methods which pause the thread environment from which they were called for a specified amount of time.

    Additionally, this class contains a nested class ThreadLocker, which also provides some thread-locking-related functionality.

    See Also:
    ThreadUtil.ThreadLocker

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ThreadUtil.ThreadLocker
      A dual-purpose utility class focused on providing thread-locking functionality.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void sleep(long ms)
      Pauses the current thread environment for the specified number of milliseconds.
      static void sleep(long time, TimeUnit units)
      Pauses the current thread environment for the specified number of time units, which is itself specified through the argument units.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • sleep

        public static void sleep(long ms)
        Pauses the current thread environment for the specified number of milliseconds.
        Parameters:

      • sleep

        public static void sleep(long time,
                         TimeUnit units)
        Pauses the current thread environment for the specified number of time units, which is itself specified through the argument units.
        Parameters:
        time - The number of time units to pause for
        units - The units for the pause time
